text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on the pavement
Shoes getting soaked
Laughing in the downpour
Feel the rhythm stroke

[Verse 2]
Splash in every puddle
Joy in every beat
Worries flowing away
Music in the street

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Hearts feel no pain
Spinning wild and free
Just you and me

[Verse 3]
Clouds are our spotlight
Thunder is our drum
Nature's symphony
Let's just succumb

[Bridge]
Twirl in the grey skies
With no fear or gain
Dream in the downpour
Magic in the rain

[Verse 4]
Smiling through the storm
Hand in hand we soar
Life is but a dance
Can't ask for more
title: Dancing in the Rain
